attributes.action: Take more action on religious  discrimination
attributes.additional_details: I have started a religious discrimination support page on Instagram @alldifferent_allequal
attributes.background: Lately I have been hearing stories about religious discrimination in the news and from religious friends so I decided to do some research on the topic and I discovered that the topic is quite neglected by the government.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
